   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(ssh_sup_SUITE).
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include("ssh.hrl").
   25: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([suite/0,
   28:          all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2,
   33:          end_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   36: 
   37: -export([default_tree/1,
   38:          killed_acceptor_restarts/1,
   39:          shell_channel_tree/1,
   40:          sshc_subtree/1,
   41:          sshd_subtree/1,
   42:          sshd_subtree_profile/1]).
   43: 
   44: -define(USER, "Alladin").
   45: -define(PASSWD, "Sesame").
   46: 
   47: -define(WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN, 500).
   48: 
   49: -define(SSHC_SUP(Pid), {sshc_sup, Pid, supervisor, [supervisor]}).
   50: -define(SSHD_SUP(Pid), {sshd_sup, Pid, supervisor, [supervisor]}).
   51: -define(SYSTEM_SUP(Pid,Address),
   52:         {{ssh_system_sup, Address}, Pid, supervisor,[ssh_system_sup]}).
   53: -define(SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(Pid), {_,Pid, supervisor,[ssh_subsystem_sup]}).
   54: -define(ACCEPTOR_SUP(Pid,Address),
   55:         {{ssh_acceptor_sup,Address},Pid,supervisor,[ssh_acceptor_sup]}).
   56: -define(ACCEPTOR_WORKER(Pid,Address),
   57:         {{ssh_acceptor_sup,Address},Pid,worker,[ssh_acceptor]}).
   58: 
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   61: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   62: suite() ->
   63:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   64:      {timetrap,{seconds,100}}].
   65: 
   66: all() ->
   67:     [default_tree, sshc_subtree, sshd_subtree, sshd_subtree_profile,
   68:      killed_acceptor_restarts, shell_channel_tree].
   69: 
   70: groups() ->
   71:     [].
   72: 
   73: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   74:     Config.
   75: 
   76: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   80:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
   81:        begin
   82: 	   PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   83: 	   UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
   84: 	   file:make_dir(UserDir),
   85: 	   [{userdir, UserDir} | Config]
   86:        end).
   87: 
   88: end_per_suite(_) ->
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: init_per_testcase(sshc_subtree, Config) ->
   92:     ssh:start(),
   93:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   94:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
   95:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
   96:                                              {user_passwords,
   97:                                               [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]}]),
   98:     [{server, {Pid, Host, Port}} | Config];
   99: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  100:     end_per_testcase(Case, Config),
  101:     ssh:start(),
  102:     Config.
  103: end_per_testcase(sshc_subtree, Config) ->
  104:     {Pid,_,_} = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
  105:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  106:     ssh:stop();
  107: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
  108:     ssh:stop().
  109: 
  110: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: %% Test cases
  112: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: default_tree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  114:     TopSupChildren = supervisor:which_children(ssh_sup),
  115:     2 = length(TopSupChildren),
  116:     {value, ?SSHC_SUP(_)} = lists:keysearch(sshc_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  117:     {value, ?SSHD_SUP(_)} = lists:keysearch(sshd_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  118:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  119:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  120: 
  121: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  122: sshc_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  123:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
  124:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  125:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  126:     Pid1 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  127:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  128:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  129:                                              {user, ?USER},
  130:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  131:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  132:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(SysSup,
  133:                              #address{address=LocalIP,
  134:                                       port=LocalPort,
  135:                                       profile=?DEFAULT_PROFILE})],
  136: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup),
  137:                 [SysSup, LocalIP, LocalPort]),
  138:     check_sshc_system_tree(SysSup, Pid1, LocalIP, LocalPort, Config),
  139:     Pid2 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  140:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  141:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  142:                                              {user, ?USER},
  143:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  144:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  145:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(_,_),
  146:                  ?SYSTEM_SUP(_,_)
  147:                 ],
  148: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  149:     ssh:close(Pid1),
  150:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(_,_)
  151:                 ],
  152: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  153:     ssh:close(Pid2),
  154:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)).
  155: 
  156: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  157: sshd_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  158:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  159:     {Daemon, HostIP, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  160:                                                   {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  161:                                                   {user_passwords,
  162:                                                    [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]}]),
  163:     ct:log("Expect HostIP=~p, Port=~p, Daemon=~p",[HostIP,Port,Daemon]),
  164:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(Daemon, #address{address=ListenIP,
  165:                                               port=Port,
  166:                                               profile=?DEFAULT_PROFILE})],
  167: 		supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  168: 		[ListenIP,Daemon]),
  169:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(HostIP, ListenIP),
  170:     check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, HostIP, Port, Config),
  171:     ssh:stop_daemon(HostIP, Port),
  172:     ct:sleep(?WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN),
  173:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  174: 
  175: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  176: sshd_subtree_profile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  177:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config),
  178:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  179:     {Daemon, HostIP, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  180:                                                   {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  181:                                                   {user_passwords,
  182:                                                    [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  183:                                                   {profile, Profile}]),
  184:     ct:log("Expect HostIP=~p, Port=~p, Profile=~p, Daemon=~p",[HostIP,Port,Profile,Daemon]),
  185:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(Daemon, #address{address=ListenIP,
  186:                                               port=Port,
  187:                                               profile=Profile})],
  188: 		supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  189: 		[ListenIP,Daemon]),
  190:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(HostIP, ListenIP),
  191:     check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, HostIP, Port, Config),
  192:     ssh:stop_daemon(HostIP, Port, Profile),
  193:     ct:sleep(?WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN),
  194:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  195: 
  196: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  197: killed_acceptor_restarts(Config) ->
  198:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config),
  199:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  200:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  201:     {ok, DaemonPid} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  202:                                      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  203:                                      {user_passwords, [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  204:                                      {profile, Profile}]),
  205: 
  206:     {ok, DaemonPid2} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  207:                                      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  208:                                      {user_passwords, [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  209:                                      {profile, Profile}]),
  210: 
  211:     Port  = ssh_test_lib:daemon_port(DaemonPid),
  212:     Port2 = ssh_test_lib:daemon_port(DaemonPid2),
  213:     true = (Port /= Port2),
  214: 
  215:     {ok,[{AccPid,ListenAddr,Port}]} = acceptor_pid(DaemonPid),
  216:     {ok,[{AccPid2,ListenAddr,Port2}]} = acceptor_pid(DaemonPid2),
  217: 
  218:     true = (AccPid /= AccPid2),
  219: 
  220:     %% Connect first client and check it is alive:
  221:     C1 = ssh_test_lib:connect("localhost", Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  222:                                                    {save_accepted_host, false},
  223:                                               {user_interaction, false},
  224:                                               {user, ?USER},
  225:                                               {password, ?PASSWD},
  226:                                               {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  227:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  228: 
  229:     ct:log("~s",[lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  230: 
  231:     %% Make acceptor restart:
  232:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [AccPid]),
  233:     exit(AccPid, kill),
  234:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(AccPid)),
  235: 
  236:     %% Check it is a new acceptor and wait if it is not:
  237:     ?wait_match({ok,[{AccPid1,ListenAddr,Port}]}, AccPid1=/=AccPid,
  238:                 acceptor_pid(DaemonPid),
  239:                 AccPid1,
  240:                 500, 30),
  241: 
  242:     ct:log("... now there should not be any SUPERVISOR REPORT.~n", []),
  243: 
  244:     true = (AccPid1 =/= AccPid2),
  245: 
  246:     %% Connect second client and check it is alive:
  247:     C2 =
  248:         case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  249:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  250:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  251:                                              {user, ?USER},
  252:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  253:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]) of
  254:             {ok,_C2} ->
  255:                 _C2;
  256:             _Other ->
  257:                 ct:log("new connect failed: ~p~n~n~s",[_Other,lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  258:                 ct:fail("Re-connect failed!", [])
  259:         end,
  260: 
  261:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]),
  262: 
  263:     ct:log("~s",[lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  264: 
  265:     %% Check first client is still alive:
  266:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  267: 
  268:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid2),
  269:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(DaemonPid2), 1000, 30),
  270:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  271:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]),
  272: 
  273:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid),
  274:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(DaemonPid), 1000, 30),
  275:     ?wait_match({error,closed}, ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]), 1000, 5),
  276:     ?wait_match({error,closed}, ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]), 1000, 5).
  277: 
  278: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  279: shell_channel_tree(Config) ->
  280:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  281:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
  282:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  283:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  284:     TimeoutShell =
  285:         fun() ->
  286:                 io:format("TimeoutShell started!~n",[]),
  287:                 timer:sleep(5000),
  288:                 ct:log("~p TIMEOUT!",[self()])
  289:         end,
  290:     {Daemon, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  291:                                                 {user_dir, UserDir},
  292:                                                 {password, "morot"},
  293:                                                 {shell, fun(_User) ->
  294:                                                                 spawn(TimeoutShell)
  295:                                                         end
  296:                                                 }
  297:                                             ]),
  298:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  299: 						      {user, "foo"},
  300: 						      {password, "morot"},
  301: 						      {user_interaction, true},
  302: 						      {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  303: 
  304:     [SubSysSup,_ChPid|_] = Sups0 = chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon),
  305: 
  306:     {ok, ChannelId0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  307:     ok = ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef,ChannelId0),
  308:     success = ssh_connection:ptty_alloc(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0, [{pty_opts,[{onlcr,1}]}]),
  309: 
  310:     ?wait_match([{_,_, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  311:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  312:                  {connection,_,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  313:                 ],
  314: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  315:                 [ChSup]),
  316:     ?wait_match([{_,GroupPid,worker,[ssh_server_channel]}
  317:                 ],
  318:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  319:                 [GroupPid]),
  320: 
  321: 
  322:     {links,GroupLinks} = erlang:process_info(GroupPid, links),
  323:     ct:log("GroupPid = ~p, GroupLinks = ~p Sups0 = ~p",[GroupPid,GroupLinks,Sups0]),
  324:     [ShellPid] = GroupLinks--[ChSup],
  325:     ct:log("GroupPid = ~p, ShellPid = ~p",[GroupPid,ShellPid]),
  326: 
  327:     receive
  328:         {ssh_cm,ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"TimeoutShell started!",Rest/binary>>}} ->
  329:             ct:log("TimeoutShell started. Rest = ~p", [Rest]),
  330:             receive
  331:                 %%---- wait for the subsystem to terminate
  332:                 {ssh_cm,ConnectionRef,{closed,ChannelId0}} ->
  333:                     ct:log("Subsystem terminated",[]),
  334:                     case {chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon),
  335:                           process_info(GroupPid),
  336:                           process_info(ShellPid)} of
  337:                         {Sups0, undefined, undefined} ->
  338:                             %% SUCCESS
  339:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon);
  340:                         {Sups0, _, undefined}  ->
  341:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  342:                             ct:fail("Group proc lives!");
  343:                         {Sups0, undefined, _}  ->
  344:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  345:                             ct:fail("Shell proc lives!");
  346:                         _ ->
  347:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  348:                             ct:fail("Sup tree changed!")
  349:                     end
  350:             after 10000 ->
  351:                     ct:log("~p:~p  Flush unexpected: ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,flush_rest()]),
  352:                     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  353:                     ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  354:                     ct:fail("CLI Timeout 1")
  355:             end
  356:     after 10000 ->
  357:             ct:log("~p:~p  Flush unexpected: ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,flush_rest()]),
  358:             ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  359:             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  360:             ct:fail("CLI Timeout 2")
  361:     end.
  362: 
  363: chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon) ->
  364:     ?wait_match([?SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(SubSysSup),
  365: 		 ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSup,_)
  366:                 ],
  367: 		supervisor:which_children(Daemon),
  368:                 [SubSysSup,AccSup]),
  369:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  370:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  371:                  {connection,ServerConnPid,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  372:                 ],
  373: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  374: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup,ServerConnPid]),
  375:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  376:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(ChSup)),
  377:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(_,_)],
  378:                 supervisor:which_children(AccSup),
  379:                 []),
  380:     [SubSysSup, ChSup, ServerConnPid, AccSup, FwdAccSup].
  381: 
  382: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  383: %% Help functions
  384: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  385: check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, Host, Port, Config) ->
  386:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  387:     ClientConn = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  388:                                                    {user_interaction, false},
  389:                                                    {user, ?USER},
  390:                                                    {password, ?PASSWD},
  391:                                                    {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  392:     ?wait_match([?SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(SubSysSup),
  393: 		 ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSup,_)],
  394: 		supervisor:which_children(Daemon),
  395:                 [SubSysSup,AccSup]),
  396:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  397:                  {_,_,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  398:                  {connection,ServerConn,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}],
  399: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  400: 		[FwdAccSup,ServerConn]),
  401:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  402:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(_,_)], supervisor:which_children(AccSup)),
  403:     {ok,PidC} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ClientConn),
  404:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  405:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  406:                  {connection,ServerConn,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}],
  407: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  408: 		[ChSup,ServerConn]),
  409: 
  410:     ?wait_match([{_,PidS,worker,[ssh_server_channel]}],
  411:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  412:                 [PidS]),
  413:     true = (PidS =/= PidC),
  414:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  415:     ssh:close(ClientConn).
  416: 
  417: 
  418: check_sshc_system_tree(SysSup, Connection, _LocalIP, _LocalPort, _Config) ->
  419:     ?wait_match([?SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(SubSysSup)],
  420:                 supervisor:which_children(SysSup),
  421:                 [SubSysSup]),
  422:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  423:                  {_,_,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  424:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  425:                 ],
  426: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  427: 		[FwdAccSup]),
  428:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  429: 
  430:     {ok,ChPid1} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Connection),
  431:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  432:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  433:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  434:                 ],
  435: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  436: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  437: 
  438:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid1,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  439:                 ],
  440:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  441:                 [ChPid1]),
  442: 
  443:     {ok,ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Connection),
  444:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  445:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  446:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  447:                 ],
  448: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  449: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  450: 
  451:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid2,worker,[ssh_client_channel]},
  452:                  {_,ChPid1,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  453:                 ],
  454:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  455:                 [ChPid1,ChPid2]),
  456: 
  457:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [ChPid1]),
  458:     exit(ChPid1, kill),
  459:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  460:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  461:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  462:                 ],
  463: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  464: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  465: 
  466:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid2,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  467:                 ],
  468:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  469:                 [ChPid2]),
  470: 
  471:     ct:log("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [ChPid2]),
  472:     exit(ChPid2, kill),
  473:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  474:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  475:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  476:                 ],
  477: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  478: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  479: 
  480:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(ChSup)),
  481: 
  482:     ct:log("... now there should not be any SUPERVISOR REPORT.~n", []).
  483: 
  484: 
  485: 
  486: acceptor_pid(DaemonPid) ->
  487:     Parent = self(),
  488:     Pid = spawn(fun() ->
  489:                         Parent ! {self(), supsearch,
  490:                                   [{AccPid,ListenAddr,Port}
  491: 
  492:                                    || ?SYSTEM_SUP(DPid,#address{address=ListenAddr,port=Port,profile=NS})
  493:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  494:                                       DPid == DaemonPid,
  495: 
  496:                                       ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSupPid,_)
  497:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(DaemonPid),
  498: 
  499:                                       ?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(AccPid, #address{address=L2,
  500:                                                                         port=P2,
  501:                                                                         profile=NS2})
  502:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(AccSupPid),
  503:                                       L2 == ListenAddr,
  504:                                       P2 == Port,
  505:                                       NS2 == NS]}
  506:                 end),
  507:     receive {Pid, supsearch, L} -> {ok,L}
  508:     after 2000 -> timeout
  509:     end.
  510: 
  511: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  512: flush_rest() -> lists:reverse(flush_rest([])).
  513: 
  514: flush_rest(Acc) ->
  515:     receive Any -> [Any|Acc]
  516:     after 0 -> Acc
  517:     end.
